characterInfo.Appears in: The Way of Kings (mentioned),  Words of Radiance (mentioned),  Arcanum Unbounded (mentioned),  Edgedancer (mentioned),  Oathbringer

characterDescription: The Nightwatcher is a kind of super-spren, Cultivation's equivalent of the Stormfather and the Sibling, associated with the Old Magic. She gives, to those who seek her, one boon and one curse ... as she has been tasked to do so by Cultivation to better understand humans. She is also associated with the order of Knights Radiant known as Bondsmiths, and is one of the three spren that can make one.
